properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 10:58AM CST until January 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Illinois...

Big Muddy River near Plumfield and Murphysboro

.Recent heavy rainfall over the Big Muddy River basin has caused river
levels to rise. At Plumfield, minor flooding is occurring and the river
is currently cresting. At Murphysboro, moderate flooding is occurring
and the river will crest tomorrow afternoon.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Big Muddy River near Murphysboro.
* until Tuesday January 21.
* At 10:30 AM Tuesday the stage was 28.2 feet.
* Flood Stage is 22.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 29.5 feet by
tomorrow early afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage
Tuesday January 21.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
